title: The Edge of Elsewhere
description: It is the year 2079. Fourteen-year-old Abbey Lane dreams in colors that don't exist anymore. Her life is a drudging routine of protecting her asthmatic genius older brother Paul from dust, and scrounging the ruin of the world with her best friend Max. But when they discover an old notebook in an abandoned university, possibilities open she never imagined. The three set out on an adventure into the past-to 1971 New York City and beyond. Along the way they rediscover nature, eat pizza, become hippies and befriend a tragic, legendary musician who may hold the keys to Earth's destiny-if only they can save him!
author: Sam Stea
